anya-e0105n5:1_0: 5. Punapi dhammānando ācariyassa bāhusaccaguṇaṁ makkhetukāmo evamāha – “tassa (buddhaghosassa)
anya-e0105n5:1_1: samayantarakovidasaṅkhātaṁ bāhusaccaṁ na tato uttaritaraṁ hoti, yaṁ ādhunikānaṁ ganthantarakovidānaṁ
anya-e0105n5:1_2: sīhaḷikabhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ vā ekādasame kharistavassasatake (1001-1100) uppannānaṁ dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhikānaṁ
anya-e0105n5:2_0: Taṁ pana sabbathāpi ayuttavacanameva. Yadi hi ādhunikā vā sīhaḷikabhikkhū, porāṇā
anya-e0105n5:2_2: samānā vā uttaritarā vā bhaveyyuṁ, te ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa aṭṭhakathāhi anāraddhacittā
anya-e0105n5:2_3: hutvā tato sundaratarā paripuṇṇatarā ca abhinavaṭṭhakathāyo kareyyuṁ, na pana te
anya-e0105n5:2_4: tathā karonti, na kevalaṁ na karontiyeva, atha kho tesaṁ ekopi na evaṁ vadati “ahaṁ
anya-e0105n5:2_5: buddhaghosena bāhusaccavasena samasamoti vā uttaritaro”ti vā, aññadatthu te ācariyassa
anya-e0105n5:2_6: aṭṭhakathāyoyeva saṁvaṇṇenti ca upatthambhenti ca, ācariyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapenti. Tenetaṁ
